video.title: Versailles
video.synopsis: King Louis XIV of France commissions a lavish palace that becomes a fierce battleground for love and politics -- and a gilded prison for nobility.

episodes.synopsis: Louis begins to transform his father's hunting lodge into a majestic château amid plots on his life and preparations for the birth of his next child.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: As Louis takes the first steps toward bringing down the nobility, starting with the scheming Montcourt, his rivalry with his brother heats up.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When an African prince visits, Louis hatches a plan to gain African territory. The Duke of Cassel schemes to sabotage the Versailles building project.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: While Louis puzzles over Philippe's military prowess and three women jockey for a coveted position in the king's bed, a dark conspiracy is brewing.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Louis organizes a royal show in the Versailles gardens following France's victory, and turns to Madame de Montespan for help reining in the nobles.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Facing a workers' strike at the construction site, Louis resists turning to the one person who could help. Cassel is forced to live at Versailles.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: With Louis gravely ill, conspirators Cassel, Montcourt, Béatrice and the Chevalier de Lorraine jump into action, aiming to put Philippe on the throne.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Louis makes a bold proposal to King Charles II of England and sends Henriette on a secret mission. Béatrice discovers a kink in her plan.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Henriette returns victorious but soon realizes something is amiss. Madame de Montespan's grip on Louis tightens. Fabien seeks revenge on a traitor.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: As Henriette's condition rapidly declines, the palace is locked down. Louis soon realizes he could lose more than his beloved mistress.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A poisoning leaves a coveted position open, the king's pregnant mistress Madame de Montespan wields her influence, and Philippe's exiled lover returns.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Further poisonings confound Marchal while the Church frowns on the aristocracy's flagrant immorality and Philippe prepares to meet his new betrothed.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Palatine gets frosty receptions from the court and her new husband, Marchal identifies a prime suspect in the poisonings, and Sophie learns her fate.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Louis prepares to send troops into the Netherlands while Madame de Montespan turns her attention to the Church and a jealous Chevalier picks a fight.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Paranoid insomniac Louis declares war, Sophie seeks a remedy to her cruel marriage and Father Pascal takes a risk in his battle with de Montespan.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Louis takes the field against William of Orange while the queen reigns in his stead, banning debauchery and negotiating a treaty with a sultan.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The queen orders an inquiry and entreats Marchal to return while the king's mental distress is not alleviated by a truce and dinner with William.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Louis returns to Versailles with newfound purity of purpose, and Philippe is surprised at his feelings for Palatine when she shows signs of poisoning.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Doubting his royal divinity, Louis consults the pious Madame Scarron while a rejected former lover summons dark forces to win back his affections.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The king learns the identities of the nobles that acquired poison and launches a violent purge of the aristocracy that seals his grip on power.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Louis celebrates his war victory by welcoming the defeated Emperor Leopold. Now a war hero, Philippe splits with Chevalier.
episodes.title: Smoke and Mirrors

episodes.synopsis: Louis and Leopold battle over control of Spain. Philippe probes the mystery of the man in the iron mask. Maintenon's power is threatened by rumors.
episodes.title: Trust Issues

episodes.synopsis: Maintenon confronts Louis, who makes a candid confession while Palatine finds evidence of her salacious past. Cardinal Leto vows to humble Louis.
episodes.title: Truth Will Out

episodes.synopsis: Philippe pursues his investigation of the man in the iron mask. Louis visits Maintenon and persuades her to return to Versailles. Fabien is released.
episodes.title: Crime and Punishment

episodes.synopsis: Louis makes a secret deal with the Ottoman envoy that undermines Leopold. Philippe suspects that Louis is complicit in the man in the iron mask case.
episodes.title: The Afterlife

episodes.synopsis: A tragedy leads Louis to switch tactics. Philippe and Fabien discover what they believe to be the identity of the man in the iron mask.
episodes.title: The Wheel of Fortune

episodes.synopsis: Louis and Philippe uncover more information that casts new doubt on the masked man's identity. Fabien tracks down the fugitive Sophie and Eleanor.
episodes.title: The Book of Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Louis and Philippe consider what to do about the masked prisoner. Leto hatches a new plan to propose Isabella of Portugal as a new wife for Louis.
episodes.title: Of Gods and Men

episodes.synopsis: The Infanta Isabella of Portugal arrives but Louis has other ideas about his betrothal, while he and Philippe must decide a family member's fate.
episodes.title: The Tinderbox

episodes.synopsis: Louis is victorious over the Protestants and Leto but his people are restless. He decides to visit the sick, unaware of a plot against him.
episodes.title: The Legacy
